title: The Twisted Tale of Stormy Gale
description: (25,900 words)I'm a time pirateâ€”born in 1810, now a 21st-century woman. I travel through time trying to right wrongs without disrupting the fragile balance between what is and what can never be.That's why it's vital that I go to 1836 and find the man who conned my brother out of his Time Travel Mechanism as quickly as possible.
